main_definition: to do something two times or double the amount of a certain action

meanings_and_examples.definition: To occur or happen two times.
meanings_and_examples.example: The storm hit our town twice this year, causing widespread damage.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To double the quantity of something.
meanings_and_examples.example: If a recipe calls for 2 cups of flour and you want to make it for more people, you may need to use 'twice' that amount, which would be 4 cups.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To do something with twice as much intensity or effort.
meanings_and_examples.example: He ran the race at a faster pace than he did in his first attempt - he gave it 'twice' the effort this time around.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In games, to score double the points of something.
meanings_and_examples.example: A player managed to score twice as many goals as their opponent during the soccer match.
